ComicInfo.Summary:
The first CRITTER volume reaches its conclusion! The life of a super hero is one of constant checks and balances, and is feeling the heat from all sides as a rampaging beast tears through town and she runs smack dab into the In Crowd! Featuring re-mastered content, an exclusive behind-the-scenes look at Critter, creator commentary and more! Don't miss out on the second of Aspen's all new BDI launch titles with the return of CRITTER!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Direct Market Cover A | Fico Ossio | 1 | B | Direct Market Cover B | Cory Zayatz & Ceci de la Cruz | 2 | C | 1:8 Retailer Incentive Cover | Nei Ruffino | 3 | D | AspenStore.com Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | V Ken Marion & Juan Fernandez | 4 | E | New York Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Rob Duenas | 5 |
